mapper.select: SELECT A.PJT_CD, A.PJT_NM, B.DEPT_CD, A.PJT_TYPE, (SELECT SHORT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD) DEPT_NM, B.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT, B.PM_EMP_NO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 WHERE EMP_NO = B.PM_EMP_NO UNION SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000_T WHERE EMP_NO = B.PM_EMP_NO) PM_EMP_NM FROM T_SM3000 A, T_P11000 B WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND A.PJT_CD LIKE '%'+#{PJT_CD}+'%' AND B.DEPT_CD LIKE '%'+#{DEPT_CD}+'%' AND A.PJT_CD LIKE #{YEAR}+'%' ORDER BY A.PJT_CD ASC
